channel.title: Set The Controls
channel.description: Set the Controls, program 2 focuses on progressive rock and space rock. Featuring StrangeCloud's version of the Pink Floyd classic "Set The Controls for the Heart of the Sun", along with songs from Trespass and Jeff Vidov. Each episode of Set The Controls will have a little background on some giant in the world of progressive rock, space rock, or electronica.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music & Talk
channel.itunes:author: Pinky Wheeler
channel.itunes:summary: Set the Controls, program 2 focuses on progressive rock and space rock. item.title: Set The Controls 4 - MP3Unsigned.com
item.description: Set The Controls #4 features music from the mp3unsigned.com music site, one of the premier independent and unsigned music sites on the web. Artists featured include Electric Salmon, Drainage, DaveRave, and DFJ. Thanks to the artists for their permission in using their tunes!
item.dc:creator: Pinky Wheeler
item.itunes:summary: Set The Controls #4 features music from the mp3unsigned.com music site, one of the premier independent and unsigned music sites on the web. Artists featured include Electric Salmon, Drainage, DaveRave, and DFJ. Thanks to the artists for their permission in using their tunes!

item.title: Set The Controls 3
item.description: Set the Controls 3 features a little of each from the progressive rock, electronica, and space rock movements. Songs from Maximum Angel, Tedd-Z, and Magellan (otherwise known as MagellanMusic) with their cover of Klaatu's "Little Neutrino." Background story of Klaatu as well as the Bullseye Records Tribute to Klaatu CD.
